website_summaries.verdict: Desirable mix of power and value in a corded leaf blower that's easy to carry.
pros: Design of this electric leaf blower includes an extended handle, making it  comfortable to use
Unit weighs 4.4 pounds, so you can use it continuously without tiring
Carries an impressive maximum air speed of 180 MPH
Works nicely for cleaning leaves from firm surfaces
cons: Motor only delivers 7 amps and only moves 180 cu

customer_reviews.title: Great blower! Really light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is amazingly really good! It have plenty of power to even blow leaf away when they are wet! It’s really light and easy to handle. It makes the cleaning leaf job pretty easy and in less time.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson88

customer_reviews.title: B&D 7-amp corded blower LB700
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect such a powerful blower at this price. I have a large front and back yard and needed a blower that was powerful but lightweight (arthritis) and this delivered beyond my expectations. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina, USA buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for short, older folks or anyone
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a couple of times and it worked just fine for me. I'm a 5'1", 71 yr. old ggmother with carpel tunnel, arthritis an a slightly torn rotator cuff. It is lightweight, comparative to others and powerful enough for the leaves I've been gathering. A big guy would likely want something more powerful/heavy duty. But this one is short enough I don't have to lift up to use. Can use at normal arm level.
customer_reviews.author: BamaMama

customer_reviews.title: Very good utility blower
customer_reviews.text: I started out wanting a Green Works cordless blower because I already had a Green Works mower and could interchange the batteries, but could not find one powerful enough at a reasonable price. I finally gave up and selected This Black and Decker. I have many other Black and Decker appliances and like them all except for their requirement for a cord. The LB700 model is light, but still powerful enough to blast stuck-on leaves from the driveway and is relatively quiet. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer man

customer_reviews.title: Boy can this baby blow...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. Assembled in less than one minute and boy can this baby blow. Upon initial use, it has exceeded my expectations. Great price for what you get. Will add to this if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy, works great!
customer_reviews.text: This B&D JB700 leaf blower works great for residential use. As long as your yard cleaning area isn't too big and you have a nice long outdoor extension cord, you'll love it. This blower is powerful enough, light weight and easy to operate. I recommend it...this baby blows really well!
customer_reviews.author: JSM69

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little blower. My old heavy Paramount burned out after almost 30 years of use and abuse. This blower blows just as hard but weighs half as much. Performance is perfectly acceptable at this price point. The complaints about this blower are unreasonable and without merit.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclebutt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought it would be. I turned it on and the power torqued back. Con is that it could use a trigger instead of an on/ off button. But well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Check if you get a cord even if it says “corded”
customer_reviews.text: Came without a cord. It didn’t say so in the description
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this blower. So lightweight and yet it totally did the job for my small yard. Unfortunately it lasted less than 2 months. Buyer beware and note that it is branded as Black + Decker, not Black & Decker.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: A corded blower with no cord!!!🤔
customer_reviews.text: What was I thinking...naturally I expected a corded blower would include a cord so you can imagine my amazement when I discovered my corded blower required the purchase of a cord. Extremely disappointed. Perhaps I didn’t read the description well enough? I simply don’t recall seeing the words “cord not included”. BIG THUMBS DOWN!!!!👎
customer_reviews.author: nd

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight, plugs in - lots of power!
customer_reviews.text: This little baby rocks! We've never owned a leaf blower as we mulch leaves, but sweeping leaves and birdseed hulls from the patio was time consuming. Saw this on a deal for around $20.00 and decided to try it. WOW - plenty of power and quiet for a blower! It is so light and easy to use, we ended up blowing off the entire driveway after clearing the patio. We are very happy with this purchase. Took this into work to blow the winter's leaves, pine cones, debris from the front of our very long building. So much easier and quieter than using the bulky, noisy gas leaf blower in our maintenance shed.
customer_reviews.author: Trillium2

customer_reviews.title: no cord included
customer_reviews.text: It's probably worth mentioning in the description that the blower doesn't come with a cord! As is, the blower is completely useless. Be prepared to spend extra 5-20$ on a cord.
customer_reviews.author: George K

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor and I have side-by-side driveways divided by a small knee-length wall. We each have a tree on the outer side of the driveway. One morning, she caught me sweeping the leaves into a pan and whipped out her corded blower to show me how crazy I was... and that's when it hit me. I need one of these in my life. Came to Amazon, read the other reviews and found this doesn't come with a cord that goes to the power outlet, so picked up one of those for use with this corded blower. It definitely gets the job done in seconds. My driveway and sidewalk have never looked so clean!
customer_reviews.author: SF Mom

customer_reviews.title: Corded blower does not come with its own cord.
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve been helpful if the description clearly stated this “corded blower” does not actually come with its own cord. Super disappointed and for the cost of purchasing the blower and cord separately, I would’ve just purchased a cordless model. Zero stars for inability to use out of the box and false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Sharksgirl858

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic power for this little chugger
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic power for this little chugger. I would have given it 5 stars but the electrical socket is agonizingly deep and I had to buy a cord to fit into it. Come on B&D give us a short cord with it at least, I'll be happy to pay a couple of bucks extra for it.
customer_reviews.author: karachikid

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This thing is powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this low priced blower to dry my vehicles off in the winter when I wash them. Also I use it to clean out dirt from the garage. I am completely amazed how much blowing power this has. It’s better than my 2 cycle gas blower that cost five times as much. It’s extremely light weight and easy to carry around. There is only one speed setting, Catagory One Hurricane. The plastic is not real thick but I don’t see any issues with it. The handle is very large and sufficient space to hang it up in your garage. The cord attaches firmly and doesn’t fall out. Very Impressive for such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Borrelli

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars all around!
customer_reviews.text: My 88 year old grand was complains that her old Black & Decker blowed was not working anymore. She had the cordless one. So I bought her this. Took a before picture, when the sun went down she went out & tested it. After not even 2 minutes it was cleared. She is very happy. Great product so far & great price!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tudor

customer_reviews.title: works fine. At least as good as the old one
customer_reviews.text: I chose this Black & Decker because it claimed to be more powerful than my old Toro that died after 14 years. I wanted a blower that was not heavy. This is lighter than my old one and at least as powerful. The black nozzle? , not sure what its called, but it is shorter than my old one. Doesn't matter, works fine. At least as good as the old one. I wanted a blower, not a mulcher and this is just a blower. I did not care about multiple speeds because I could not think of why I would want anything but full blast.
customer_reviews.author: HYTRIN5

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This blower died in less than a month and I cannot get a refund - don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly G

customer_reviews.title: Blows strong
customer_reviews.text: I had to blow down 5 years worth of wet leaves in my gravel area in the backyard. It takes time and lot of blowing but I eventually got it all blown away, it's really strong, as I am blowing, I can see gravel rocks moving around from it. I am impressed. I love how light it is, corded is little hassle to get plugs nearby and moving plugs to move further through the backyard but it works and lighter than gas one and more power than battery one. You cannot beat this for the price $30. It's excellent! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer, Mara

customer_reviews.title: Good Power for Price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that it would be powerful enough given the price, but I was very pleasantly surprised to find out it was more than sufficient for my needs. Light and easy to use as well. Much better than the much more expensive cordless blowers, and very easy to cover a large area with a decent outdoor extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: HZB

customer_reviews.title: Cord purchased separately
customer_reviews.text: Just received our new blower in very short time. Please about that but, "Built in cord retention prevents frustrating interruptions during cleanup" This was in the description of the leaf blower so we thought it meant a cord was included. How else could there be a built in cord retention mechanism? The cord would cost more than the blower. Fortunately my husband found he already had a cord that will work. So he has tried it and seems to be a good blower but the information should be more clear. That is the only reason for the lower rating.
customer_reviews.author: K. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Light and compact blower.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is small, I wanted it for my 5th wheel camper where storage space is limited. It is used for general clean up on the outdoor rug, and for blowing the fish flies out of the door/entrance area so they don’t come in the camper. For this, it works great. It is not big enough for the yard at my house, but I have the ones that are. Some people wrote this is underpowered, I disagree. For the size, you can,t expect it to lift a pile of leaves 3 feet thick.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMarty

customer_reviews.title: I paid for NEW but no cord!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is unbelievable! I paid for a NEW blower, and when I received the box and opened it, there was nothing in the box but the blower itself. No cord, and no warranty card!! How does Amazon think its OK to continue shipping out USED items for things that folks like me pay in order to receive NEW items?? This is ridiculous, and it's happening far too often. If I didn't have to rate with stars, I wouldn't. On the "bright" side, I am getting a free replacement. But that's coming until Thursday, when I needed it TODAY. Outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Remybuxaplenty

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: my expectations were bigger than the blower. I own other blowers that are more powerful so I was expecting a lot. After trying it the blower is more limited than I expected. For light duty work I find this more suitable. I bought this blower to move material down a drain. I was having problems with material building up at the drain. it maybe enough for the job. But other than that it is well built. Small and light. That maybe what some people are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ar

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a little blower!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little beast! We have a vacation rental that gets pine needles all over the deck and porch and it is a pain to move furniture to sweep beneath. On a whim I ordered this little guy and laughed when I first used it as I can blow the 13’ x 13’ deck in 15 seconds You DO have to order a power cord separately. But then again, I only needed a 15’ cord but can connect a 50’ one if needed for another area. Only one speed on this “HIGH”. Seems sturdily built and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: KSwan

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Electrical Blower for Price
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive due to the high percentage of negative reviews: The Black and Decker brand has been around since the early 1900’s. Black and Decker is known for its highest of quality tools over the centuries. Took a chance: Received: May 2 Light weight Electric Very powerful Since receiving have used over 35 times Exceeded expectations Price great No more heavy gas blowers Get longer extension cords 200ft (is what I needed).
customer_reviews.author: N. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice little blower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my leaves this fall. I'm a little disappointed in the blowing power but it does the job so far. It has two power levels and the lower level is useless so you'll have to use the second power level. I really should have spent a few dollars more and got a more powerful blower. Good thing is it uses the same battery as my other Black & Decker tools so I can use the battery on everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Wislndixie

customer_reviews.title: Good for lightweight cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I did spend good amount of time reading the reviews and I was worried that this not the tool I need. When I received it and worked with it, it was what I wanted. Based on the reviews, I see that people with more than leafs cleaning were not happy, but I this this tool is just for that, the power of it is designed for that. The usage determines the satisfaction. My only thing about it is the power point is not tight enough to hold the cord, and kept disconnecting, I was able to overcome that by tightening the core with the tool before plugging it, which made it more difficult to disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Issa Barmawi

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed it to do!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my dad...it was just sitting waiting to be wrapped and mailed...that is until the leaves from the trees around the house started taking over my front yard, deck, and patio. I was going to buy one, but decided to take his gift (hahaha, bad daughter) and use it for myself. Glad I did! It was my first time using a blower but it was easy, powerful and did its job beautifully! I bought another one for my dad to replace the one I took. Will wrap and mail. He is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and it blows pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So I had an older model with 2 blowing speeds, low and high. I liked it a lot but the motor went out. They don't make it anymore in 2 speeds but it was heavy. So ended up getting this one, didn't know if I would like it with just the one speed but I do. It's light weight and it blows pretty good. Hopefully it lasts at least 10 yrs. I have had this for several months now and just loving the weight of it. I pretty much blow off my patio everyday, we have all year round falling leaves in Texas so it's an endless chore.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight blower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item in the fall Because I’m a petite women and want to blow or rake the leaves and sometimes I can’t. I saw this item was light weight And thought I would give it a try. Wow what an awesome buy it really is light. Blows like no tomorrow I couldn’t believe it. We are looking for a leave Blower for a good price Black & Decker definitely did a number on this one do you recommend this to any woman that has to do it on our own
customer_reviews.author: Kissezamour

customer_reviews.title: This thing really blows!...in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean off the debris off my porch. My complex is right next to the woods. Between that and the lawn guys always leaving a mess on my property, this thing was a must. Really good investment. Blew everything off my patio with ease. It’s very powerful. Downside: the cord. It kept coming unplugged, even with the cord keeper. Plus, amazon sent the blower not packaged at all. Arrived in the box it’s sold in and kind of got messed up. Overall, I would recommend. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great performer at the right price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little unit. I bought this blower to replace my 25 y-o B&D corded blower that finally crapped out. I was surprised how compact and lightweight a unit it is. In addition, it blows a large volume of air given its smallish size. It’s all that I need to blow out my garage, deck, and front porch. It’s not tiring on your arm, and it’s substantially quieter than my old unit. I’m very happy with this purchase. Seems well made and durable. Not expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: TonyC

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt come with a cord. Separately cord will cost you an additional $20-$30.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you know this information before purchasing and dont assume that OF COURSE they would include a cord in there like I did because its a CORDED leaf blower. Altogether you can find a better leaf blower for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wajster

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I was shocked it didn't come with a power cord, but once I understood that you plug in however long of an extension cord you need into it I was off to work. Man oh man did this work! I was able to clean my driveway, back yard, side yard, street parking spot and walk ways with ease. It does't weigh a lot but this little guy packs a mean leaf blowing punch! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Leaf Control
customer_reviews.text: We live in an RV park where the tree leaves are constantly piling up next to and under our rig. The park had a heavy duty blower, but it burned up recently, so we puchased this one for our use. It is very light weight, but has enough power to manage the leaves. It's not as strong as the old, heavy unit, but it works for what we want. Taking the nozzle off makes the unit easy to store. With no power cord, it packs very small.
customer_reviews.author: Dee NTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little blower, especially for the price. I would have preferred a battery powered blower but they were too expensive and, even though using the extension cord is a bit of bother, I'm glad I bought this blower. It has plenty of power and is light weight. It does a great job of blowing out the garage, driveway, walkway, and leaves from the flower beds. I've only had it a few weeks so I cannot speak to longevity but so far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JNMNR

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good power!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly for this is SUPER easy it’s literally two pieces. Keep in mind this does not include a cord and you need to have your own power cord to attach to it. The blower works very well and the power is definitely strong for what you get for your money. I’ve used it to dry off my car after washing, blowing debris from around the exterior of my home and cleaning out the garage. Definitely a great unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GetFit NoExcuses

customer_reviews.title: This blower works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This small blower gets the job done! Perfect size for this nearly 70 year old female. Lové all Black+Decker products. It’s very light weight and two pieces snap together. When not in use back in the box it goes! Great price for a perfect blower!
customer_reviews.author: Trish K.

customer_reviews.title: This has POWER
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of constantly sweeping my patio and moving my rug to clean under so looked for an inexpensive blower to help speed up the process. I wanted a corded one so I don't have to remember to charge anything. Man was I impressed when I turned this sucker on! It has got some serious power! It has worked perfect ever since I opened it. It's light enough for my kids to help out with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Poor , Damaged, Packaging, Although Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, and was totally sold on this product. Although I received today and was disappointed in the condition it arrived in, the box had plastic wrapped around it ripped, very poor packaging, as you can see by the pictures. I opened the box, the contents seemed ok, I decide to try it out to make sure the blower worked due to poor packaging, to my surprise, the blower worked without issue, will update as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Susan, San Jose, California

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blower
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my light needs. I blow my patio and walkway off daily. So much better than sweeping (and does a better job!). I have a muscle issue and my arms aren’t as strong as they used to be. I was concerned about this being heavy- not at all! Very light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME little product!
customer_reviews.text: For $25, you really can't go wrong with this blower. I've used it several times to clean out the leaves and dirt in my garage and patio and it worked as expected. I purposely purchased the corded version as I wanted consistent power and I don't regret it at all. I just purchased a 25' long outdoor power cord and just keep it in the same box as the blower. Can't believe I was sweeping with a broom this whole time. Do yourself a favor and pick one up!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Y

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous value in a powerful, lightweight blower
customer_reviews.text: I have a small deck, patio and back staircase that sits directly under two trees that are a constant source of debris. Because I have an outdoor outlet handy, I opted for this corded blower -- which was about 1/5th the price of the cordless models I'd originally shopped for. I still can't believe the price point for this little gem. It's a true Black & Decker tool that gets the deck, patio and stairs done in the blink of an eye. If the electrical outlets around your yard accommodate a corded blower, I just can't recommend this one enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Small yet effective
customer_reviews.text: Lets take into account it's size, ok? It works great for the money and size. I have only used it a few times so far. I have a long driveway, a huge deck and trampoline to blow leaves and debris. This little thing does just fine. I'm sure a bigger blower would make quicker work of it, but I'm happy with its compact effectiveness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to low off our patio and sidewalk areas of dust and leaves. I wasn’t expecting much but I can say this little thing had more power then I was expecting. For the price of it you can not beat it. I also bought the two year warranty just in case but I’m all reality if it broke In like a year and it only cost less then $40 I got my money’s worth. But now I’m guaranteed atleast two years so I’m pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, works, easy to use, powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price, pretty powerful, even with wet leaves. Lightweight, and easy to use. The only bad things i would have to say is i did not like how my plug kept coming out until my dad showed me how to wrap it around the handle. Not sure if it's the plug or the actual blower itself but also did not like how it's just a straightnose, couldn't get leaves away from crevices unless you blew them straight. Wish it had different hookups!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tool for clearing leaves. I used to borrow my neighbor's battery powered blower which worked well but ran out of power after clearing only half my lawn. With 100' of cord, I can run this blower forever and clear my entire backyard. Despite a couple reviews citing that this blower had insufficient power, I found it to have ample power. And it is very light weight & easy to use. I love it! Makes clearing leaves almost fun!
customer_reviews.author: Cmike.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, one speed and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight! This is less than 5 lbs and is very easy to use. I used this for a few months and decided to upgrade to the model with the vacuum and blower. That thing is so heavy, I have only used it once. what a difference an extra 5 lbs makes. I will most likely be ordering another one of these lighter models, and forget about the vacuum model. One speed, not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Graham

customer_reviews.title: For my light use purposes it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to blow bird seed and other tree leaves etc. off of the deck, the open front porch floor and overhang, and at times the driveway itself. I bought the corded one as I only use it in these limited areas. It has quite a 'punch' to it for my needs. Noise is tolerable for the short time i am using it. Lightweight enough for me to maneuver it easily. If I had more heavy use I would get an non-corded one for maneuverability but it works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: SLJ

customer_reviews.title: A-1
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive blower is very nice. It has tremendous power for $29.00 and I cleaned out my garage with it in about 2-3 minutes. I am very pleased. Why didn't I get this sooner. One thing to notice though is that you need a cord to plug into it and the machine doesn't take a 3rd prong. In other words it is two pronged.
customer_reviews.author: Misunderstood

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS LEAF BLOWER
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for cleaning off the patio or to put leaves in a pile. THE ONLY THING IS, IT DID NOT COME WITH A CORD!!! Make sure you order a cord along with this. It works great and is light weight. Good for small jobs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Stringer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my mom who is 82 and still LOVES to be in the yard...The old one was way too heavy for her but this one is light weight, powerful and gets the job done. She had a blast with it right out of the box!!! She finally let me play with it (!) and I could not believe how light weight it was yet how powerful and well it blew these wet leaves to the curb! Highly recommend! The price can not be beat for this!
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like This One.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do--no more pulling and pulling to get an engine started, no more mixing gasoline. And one frustration with the gasoline ones is when I would like to turn the blower off for a couple of minutes to reposition myself before turning it back on. With the gasoline engine, that was a serious nuisance, now it's a piece of cake. Having a long cord dragging around is well worth the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Webster

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I was very surprised at the low weight of this blower. It is literally a snap to to put together. The nozzle just snaps to the blower and you are ready to go. Even though this is light weight it dried my cars very well after a good washing and blew all of my spring leaves with power to spare. You need this!
customer_reviews.author: MBeshada

customer_reviews.title: Great Power!!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the KIMO cordless blower with 150 mph. The unit was powerful, but the battery barely lasted 10 minutes. I looked at reviews of other cordless units and saw that most of them were just like this unit as far as short battery life. I returned that unit and purchased this unit. First off this was much more powerful than the KIMO unit. It does utilize an extension cord which I already had for my hedge trimmer. It was not much of an inconvenience as I had expected. For the price, you can't beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: carl wesley taylor

customer_reviews.title: This blower is so much stronger than the Green Works blower I previously used.
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback to this blower is making sure the extension cord doesn't get caught or wrapped around something that makes you stop and unwrap it. As far as blowing grass and leaves from our sidewalks, driveways, and porches, it's strength is enough to blow other debris away. I use it with a 100ft cord with very little problem, except dragging the cord over obstacles now and then. Excellent product without the hassle of weight with a gas blower, and batteries to recharge frequently with a battery operated one.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline j. crawfis

customer_reviews.title: so it's easy to clear things after I mow
customer_reviews.text: Does its job! I don't mind that its corded because it's more powerful, and I have a postage stamp yard/walk, so it's easy to clear things after I mow. There is a battery-operated version that matches my drill/weed whacker batteries, but I opted for the cord so to have more power.
customer_reviews.author: A. Andrew Joyce

customer_reviews.title: I can see my beautiful grass
customer_reviews.text: This old lady just spend a half an hour blowing leaves back into my neighbors yard. This Gizmo worked wonderfully. Now I am a yard Warrior!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy'sMom

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows...
customer_reviews.text: Everything to be expected for this leaf blower. It has a good amount a blowing power and is very light & easy to toss around (please don't do it literally). The only thing to mention is it is louder than expected for a corded machine. But other than that, it's everything you'd expect from this basic Black+Decker.
customer_reviews.author: MightyMongrel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Xmas gift for my husband. It’s been raining like crazy so we haven’t had a chance to use it yet. The first time he used it the plug prongs broke. We are outside our return for Amazon so my lucky there. I was so excited to replace his jancky old blower and then this happens. DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the corded style as the cordless one never seemed to be charged when I wanted to use it. I have a messy tree close to my patio and it is much easier to blow it clean than to have to sweep. I also like the fact that it is inexpensive and lightweight compared to heavy rechargeable models.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Moss

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This is very lightweight and very powerful. I believe it's lost some blowing power since I first got it (after a few months use). But it's still plenty powerful to do what I need....blowing leaves around the yard/patio and form roof. If you need something more powerful than this, then you need to buy a gas powered one w an engine strapped to your back. Did I mention it's very lightweight?
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: perfect for light yard work
customer_reviews.text: we have a tree in our nieghbors yard that shares both shade and "gifts" to our space. The leaves, twigs, and acorns are never easy to sweep up so we bought this instead. works perfectly! this little blower has power and can even pushout unwanted dirt patches in my driveway. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning driveway
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Not recommended for blowing leaves. I use this to blow my driveway and concrete deck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something made in USA, and this one is working well. It is probably a little more powerful than my late Ryobi. I use the extension cord as batteries just don't last long enough on a blower. I use it to clean concrete porches, carport, but mostly to clean my zero turn mower, tiller and tractor after running those. Keeps machines looking new!
customer_reviews.author: JRae

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little blower to use primarily in our patio and in the garage. My wife really likes it because it’s very light and easy to maneuver. The air pressure is definitely strong enough to blow most everything that we want to clean off our patio and garage. So far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Manhart

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but loud.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong blow, some times it moves the leaves upwards if you get too close to the building. Light but very loud and we used it quickly just for hard to reach area then we raked afterwards. Protect your ears if you use for longer than 5 minutes to protect yourself but don't use too long for neighbors and children or pets would go nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Peonies

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight but plenty of blow
customer_reviews.text: I simply use this blower to clear grass clippings and debris off the sidewalk after mowing, blow debris off the front and rear entrances and blow dead bugs, spiderwebs, etc. from outside corners. It is perfect for these simple tasks, certainly powerful enough, light-weight and priced right. It might have some difficulty with heavier wet leaves, but I really do not know for sure. Anything larger, more powerful and heavier would be over- kill and unnecessary expense. Buy it for the above types of tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice little blower
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, arrived in one piece. This thing works great for an inexpensive blower! I use it to blow out my garage and shed, to blow dust off my motorcycle before a ride, and blow off my ride on mower before I put it away. Would buy again in a minute, great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: cardoctor

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I had a Blak & Decker leaf blower that finally quite working after 20 years so I searched for a replacement. This one was very similar to the old one I had except an updated look. It works great, isn't too heavy and gets the job done. I live in Northeast Ohio so I am blowing large amount of leaves and it did everything I needed. I was detered at first because this had some low rating but the majority of them are that it doesn't come with a cord. I wouldn't expect it to come with a cord especially at this price. Definately would recommed this blower.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Light. Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, 5 star. PERFECT for blowing leaves off desk with a close outlet. Didn’t want to fuss with keeping a battery charged. Extremely light weight. Plenty of power for this task. If you need tons of power, move along. But this was by no means “weak” and perfect for small to medium tasks. Wouldn’t do a full yard with it but it could be done. Quality for price, happy!
customer_reviews.author: Steve From USA

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Blower
customer_reviews.text: We just installed a composite deck and it was recommended to blow off debris instead of sweeping. This blower fits the bill perfectly. Very basic...simple on off switch, lightweight and compact in size. The blower produces a concentrated, powerful stream of air, which is ideal for dislodging any debris between boards. I’m not sure it would be the best for blowing leaves...the vortex-style blower is probably better at that. But for my purpose, there is none better.
customer_reviews.author: Rob28724

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s good enough..., very loud though, probably the entire block will know when I am blowing 😏
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Lite and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had an adjustment to lower the blower speed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The Black and Decker leaf blower was such a great item that I eventually purchased two. One for home and one for my apartment. It has really strong blowing power and I'll never need to sweep my deck or porches again. Why sweep, when you can blow it off in seconds. I like that they are electric. No gasoline fumes to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Reesa

customer_reviews.title: New way to rake leaves
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved me hours of work! Blew all my leaves away to one spot and husband raked in behind me. Never take the old fashioned way again. Only con, Make sure you buy and outdoor extension cord with it if you don’t have one, it doesn’t come with.but wasn’t a deal breaker for me
customer_reviews.author: Shannon V.

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong
customer_reviews.text: Replaced another blower that died with this one. It doesn’t have much power compared to my last one. If you have a small area and light items to blow off this one will work. But if you have a large yard and heave wet leave get something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my deck. It's small, light, and has a lot of power. I love that you just need an extension cord and don't need to fiddle with fuel or oil. My kiddo loves to blow the leaves and pine needles off the deck. It makes cleaning fun and fast!!
customer_reviews.author: GotCats?

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE PRICE (THIS IS MY SECOND BLOWER I'VE PURCHASED) THIS IS ALL i NEED TO TAKE CARE OF LEAVES. I BLOW THEM ONTO A LARGE PIECE OF PLASTIC AND DRAG THE LEAVES INTO MY COMPOST PILE. i HAVE SHELL DRIVEWAY AND IT EASILY KEEPS THE LEAVES OFF THE DRIVEWAY WHILE KEEPING THE SHELL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Too simple! well made (even for China) does the job and a great price. Nozzle a little shorter than expected but one can hold with straight arm. More of a strong sweeper, garage/ deck, driveway than fall leaf blower..exactly what I wanted. Buy two, they are cheap. Only unknown: length of service but last B&D is 12 years old and going. I'm replacing another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mac. McD.

customer_reviews.title: Great blower with plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Have three oak trees in my front yard and deal with millions of leaves a year. The wife and I were tired of taking every weekend and grabbed on of these. The wife loves the factor that while I'm at work she can knock out the front yard and driveway with ease thanks to the power this blower puts out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marin II

customer_reviews.title: Save my aching back for sure love it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about purchasing but after many, many years I had enough sweeping my huge backyard, mostly concrete I got this and used and was so happy with power and able to maneuver very easily. I shaved off at least 2 hours of sweeping Very happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: So happy I went ahead and bought it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how well it worked, it was so very light, and had much more power than I thought it would.. I was able to do my whole carport and around my yard with no problem. Almost didn’t get it because some of the negative reviews so happy that I went ahead and got it.😁
customer_reviews.author: SHERRI DALEY

customer_reviews.title: The blower
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and powerful. Easily blows off my pool area of leaves and debris. Also worked well blowing debris out of my decorative rock areas. Haven't tried it yet on leaves in the yard but I will
customer_reviews.author: book writer

customer_reviews.title: a real mover!
customer_reviews.text: At my age (72) I found it difficult to continue using the two-stroke gas trimmer. I was skeptical that the Black & Decker electric string trimmer could do the job, but I was so wrong! Lightweight, powerful, efficient, the Black & Decker model is restrained only by the electric cord needed to power it. I am so pleased to be able to do trimming and edging again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: Blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blower for my Apt. It is a new build and there is clay dust every where. This blower helps to get rid of the dust. Will have to wait until Winter. The snow should help get rid of most of the awful dust.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than expected!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I didn't expect this blower to be anywhere near as effective as the bigger "industrial strength" models, but I was very pleasantly surprised. My front porch area gets daily invasions of thousands of small leaves from nearby mesquite trees and this bad boy just hurls them into oblivion in a matter of seconds. I now have a well used broom for sale. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: IslandHawk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little blower!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really surprised me. When I took it out of the box I was a bit taken back and a little disappointed by how small it was compared to the one I have been using for the last several years. And then I turned it on..... WOW! Way stronger than the old one and like I said, noticeably smaller and lighter. Very happy with this blower!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how powerful this small, easy to operate blower is! It took a few tries to learn to control it to keep everything moving away from me! I highly recommend this for the small to average garden, driveway use. There are , of course, many other uses for it also.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I don't like having to mess with gas or deal with dying batteries. I love the electric spin trimmer that I have. I actually haven't used the blower yet, since my husband grabbed it and cleaned up the yard with it. He said it is plenty powerful and a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K Bressette

customer_reviews.title: Very light and does job well. Looks very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very light like says and I don’t have strength or muscle, because of illness.
customer_reviews.author: Beckylou

customer_reviews.title: It says it is corded which is a lie it has prongs for an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: It says it is corded which is a lie. It has prongs for an extension cord. I will write more once I’ve used it, but the description is very misleading; there is no cord with it. You must have an extension cord for this tool to work.
customer_reviews.author: suki

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little blower! Way more power than I expected-clears my 40 foot pool deck and patio easily (keeping in mind all is surrounded by leaf-dropping trees) weighs next to nothing -best “under $40 “ purchase I’ve made in a long time
customer_reviews.author: themom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a petite woman
customer_reviews.text: This thing was exactly what I was looking for! It's does the job and it's not overwhelming for me. I love that you can just plug it in without having to worry about gas. Make sure you also have a heavy duty, outdoor extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: yoga_mama

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP! FAST! PERFECT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have leaves and debris in front of your door making your patio look disgusting and you don't want creepy crawlers on your carpets, buy this insanely inexpensive and perfect product. Buy cheap goggles to protect your eyes and use a paper mask if you have allergies, and be sure to have a LONG EXTENSION CORD too. But in 60 seconds tops, your patio will be immaculate! I should have bought this 3 years ago! NO BROOM NECESSARY.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and stores in the box it arrived in. Needs a cord but that is why it is light weight and easy to use. It is still new to me so I'm learning where to point the nozzle to achieve accuracy in direction I want the debris to go. Sometimes it surprises me. I u.se it to "sweep" my patio So far, I'm very pleased with the blower.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: It Blows Rocks The Size of Golf Balls!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, it has crazy good power! I was confused at first when I thought the cord was retractable and I had to “pull it out”. Nope! You have to use an extension cord. Didn’t read that part I guess! But I have one and used the blower immediately! It works sooo good! I don’t have to sweep anything anymore lol
customer_reviews.author: Beachinnbum

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Electric Leaf Blower, 7-Amp (LB700)
product_meta.description: Style:Leaf BlowerThe BLACK+DECKER LB700 corded blower features a 7 Amp Motor which provides a powerful & efficient blowing performance. This blower can move up to 180MPH/180CFM for fast & easy cleanup of leaves & debris. it also features built in cord retention prevents frustrating interruptions during cleanup. This unit is lightweight at only 4.4 lbs for easy one handed use. Includes: (1) LB700 7 amp blower, & (1) blow tube.
feature_bullets: 7 Amp motor provides a powerful and efficient blowing performance
Moves up to 180Mph/180CFM for fast and easy cleanup of leaves and debris.Uses:Ideal for clearing debris from lawns, driveways, sidewalks, and decks
Built in cord retention prevents frustrating interruptions during cleanup
Air speed: Up to 180 mph; Included Components: (1) LB700 7Amp Blower, (1) Blow Tube

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,160 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
